text: Kogda im chitayut ayaty Allakha, yasno dokazyvayushchiye, chto On Vsemogushch i mozhet voskresit' posle smerti, u nikh imeyetsya tol'ko odin dovod, kotoryy oni privodyat, chtoby ubezhat' ot istiny: "Voskresite zhe nashikh ottsov, yesli vy pravdivy, utverzhdaya, chto voskreseniye nepremenno nastanet
